JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by PERSON , former Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On CARDINAL DATE the applicant was put on a waiting list with a view to provision with state housing . On CARDINAL DATE the applicant was put on a waiting list for participation in cooperative housing construction . On DATE it was established that the applicant was entitled to a CARDINAL - room cooperative flat .

On DATE ORG ( the “ ORG ” ) ruled that the applicant be provided with a CARDINAL - room cooperative flat regardless of his order of priority on the waiting list . The regard was had to the fact that the applicant , who was married with CARDINAL minor children , was living in a room in a communal flat .
On DATE ORG ruled that the applicant may obtain the membership in the housing construction cooperative ZhSK-CARDINAL ( the “ NORP ” ) .
On DATE ORG quashed its decision of CARDINAL DATE noting that no CARDINAL - room flat was available in the ORG to be given to the applicant .
On DATE the applicant lodged a claim against ORG with ORG GPE seeking provision of a cooperative flat for his family .
On DATE the court held a preparatory hearing . It sent a request to the ORG to obtain certain documents and scheduled the first hearing for DATE .

On DATE the applicant partially modified his claims . He claimed that the payment for the cooperative flat be made by the ORG due to the authorities’ failure to fulfil their obligation with regard to provision of his family with housing . He also lodged claims against the ORG and asked the court to obtain certain documentary evidence from it . The court adjourned the hearing until DATE pending receipt of the documents .

The court adjourned the hearing on DATE due to the applicant ’s failure to appear . The court further adjourned the hearing of the matter on DATE and CARDINAL May and DATE , granting the applicant ’s request to obtain new documentary evidence and serve process on a witness .

On DATE the court adjourned the hearing pending receipt of the documents requested earlier . The next hearing was scheduled for CARDINAL DATE . It was adjourned due to the failure of the applicant ’s representative to appear .
On DATE the applicant asked the court to obtain certain documentary evidence . The court granted the applicant ’s request and adjourned the hearing until DATE pending the receipt of the documents .
On DATE the respondent ’s representative failed to appear . The court further adjourned the hearing scheduled for CARDINAL DATE due to the applicant ’s failure to appear .

The court heard the matter and dismissed the applicant ’s claims on DATE . The court relied on the decision issued by ORG DATE where it noted that no CARDINAL - room flat was available . The court also dismissed the applicant ’s monetary claims . Neither the applicant nor his representative were present .
On DATE the St. Petersburg City Court upheld the judgment of CARDINAL DATE on appeal .

On DATE the applicant brought another claim with ORG against ORG . The applicant alleged that the respondent party had failed to take certain measures to ensure his membership in a housing construction cooperative . The first hearing took place on DATE . It was adjourned pending receipt of documentary evidence requested by the applicant .

The next hearing took place on DATE . The applicant challenged the authenticity of the documents received and asked the court to obtain certified copies . The court granted the request and adjourned the hearing until DATE .
On DATE the respondent ’s representative failed to appear and the court adjourned the hearing until DATE .

The court further adjourned the hearing of the matter on CARDINAL DATE due to the failure of the applicant ’s representative to appear , on DATE and CARDINAL DATE pending receipt of the documents requested by the applicant , on CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE due to the applicant ’s failure to appear .
On DATE the applicant challenged the authenticity of the materials in the case file . The court granted the request lodged by ORG to obtain original copies of the said materials .

The applicant further asked for adjournment of the hearing on DATE and CARDINAL DATE pending consideration of his complaint by another court and his representative ’s illness respectively . On DATE and DATE the applicant ’s representative did not appear and the hearings were adjourned .
The court adjourned the hearing on DATE granting the applicant ’s request for other documentary evidence .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s claims . GPE upheld the judgment on appeal on CARDINAL DATE .
On DATE the applicant brought another action against ORG and other state bodies and a housing construction cooperative seeking annulment of an agreement signed by them .

On DATE ORG of GPE discontinued the proceedings due to the applicant ’s repeated failure to appear in court . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s request to resume examination of the claim . On DATE GPE upheld the decision on appeal .
On DATE the applicant brought an action against the ORG and ORG seeking enforcement of the decision of DATE to obtain the membership in the ORG and be provided with a CARDINAL - room flat .
On DATE the Moskovskiy District Court of GPE discontinued the proceedings noting that the applicant ’s claims were similar to the ones already pending before ORG .
On DATE ORG quashed the decision and remitted the case for examination on the merits .

On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s claim . The court noted that there was no CARDINAL - room flat available in the ORG to be granted to the applicant . On DATE ORG quashed the judgment and remitted the case for a new examination . The court held that ORG had relied in its findings only on the testimony of the chairman of the ORG that was not confirmed by any documentary evidence .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s claim . On DATE GPE upheld the judgment .
On DATE the applicant challenged a decision of ORG DATE concerning his entitlement to a cooperative flat .

On DATE the court adjourned the hearing due to the failure of the applicant ’s representative to appear . On DATE the court further adjourned the hearing pending receipt of the documentary evidence requested by the applicant . The documents were not delivered on time and the court adjourned another hearing on DATE .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the court adjourned the hearing due to the failure of the applicant ’s representative to appear .
On DATE the NORP ORG of GPE dismissed the applicant ’s claims . GPE upheld the said judgment on appeal on DATE .
